history.content:
Posting a quick way to help out some fellow Berkeley students with their Senior capstone research project! 

The students taking the Soc. 190 Seminar Families and Technology kindly ask that you contribute to their class research project by taking this short survey about how you use different forms of technology to communicate with family. The survey will take about three minutes to complete. Your participation will be greatly appreciated! Survey link: https://berkeley.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_5jQ4niQ1Ojqsuyi.
history.subject: Take 3-minute Survey to Help Advance Research on Family and Technology
